required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of LY03003 in Patients With Advanced-stage PD
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Multiple Ascending Dose Study in Patients With Advanced-stage Parkinson's Disease to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of LY03003 Following Intramuscular Injections

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics and safety of LY03003 in patients with advanced-stage PD.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From Titration Period to Day 50 of Dose Maintenance Period
From Titration Period to Day 50 of Dose Maintenance Period
